info.author: Gerry Christiansen
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
A enterprise framework for developing true enterprise python applications
===============================================================================
This project is designed to make building python applications to be used in enterprise systems.
There are many frameworks that exist for creating python web applications and/or APIs using python.  However,
the needs of enterprise level applications are often not met by these frameworks. Namely:

* API level calls for all operations
* CLI to perform automated/scripting tasks against the application

PyLegos borrows many of the concepts used by other application frameworks.  The framework is somewhat opinionated.  It
currently requires a particular file structure.  In future releases we hope to eliminate this requirement so that the
structure can be adjusted to meet the style of the development team.
info.keywords: framework enterprise development libraries database tools
info.name: pylegos
info.summary: A python framework for enterprise projects
info.html_description:
This project is designed to make building python applications to be used in enterprise systems. There are many frameworks that exist for creating python web applications and/or APIs using python. However, the needs of enterprise level applications are often not met by these frameworks. Namely:

  • API level calls for all operations
  • CLI to perform automated/scripting tasks against the application

PyLegos borrows many of the concepts used by other application frameworks. The framework is somewhat opinionated. It currently requires a particular file structure. In future releases we hope to eliminate this requirement so that the structure can be adjusted to meet the style of the development team.
